overview:
Tina is responsible for NBVPâ€™s daily operations, office management, communications and PR, as well as maintaining correspondence with the firmâ€™s limited partners and supporting Founding Partner, Jack Biddle.

Prior to joining Novak Biddle in December of 1999, Tina spent eight years at Wolf Trap Foundation for the Performing Arts in Vienna, Va. She began her work at Wolf Trap in the Development Department, helping to raise funds for the organization. From 1995 to 1999, she held the position of Director of Special Events. Prior to Wolf Trap she worked for Vienna, Virginia-based Washington Entertainment Magazine as Managing Editor.

relationships.title: Operation Manager And Executive Assistant To Jack Biddle
